docs.lead_paragraph: Defense attorneys for a woman accused of cutting an unborn baby from another woman's womb want to keep comments the victim made during an appearance on the "Dr. Phil" show from being heard at trial.

headline.main: 'Dr. Phil' Show Comments Questioned in Fetus Cutting Case
headline.print_headline: 'Dr. Phil' Show Comments Questioned in Fetus Cutting Case

docs.snippet: Defense attorneys for a woman accused of cutting an unborn baby from another woman's womb want to keep comments the victim made during an appearance on the "Dr. Phil" show from being heard at trial.

docs.abstract: How should health officials respond to this mosquito-borne virus?
docs.snippet: How should health officials respond to this mosquito-borne virus?

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. disease detectives have moved into full outbreak mode over the Zika virus, assembling a team of hundreds of experts to try to better understand its impact as it spreads in the Americas.

headline.main: CDC Says in Full Outbreak Mode in Response to Zika
headline.print_headline: CDC Says in Full Outbreak Mode in Response to Zika

docs.snippet: U.S. disease detectives have moved into full outbreak mode over the Zika virus, assembling a team of hundreds of experts to try to better understand its impact as it spreads in the Americas.

docs.lead_paragraph: Around the fifth month of her pregnancy, Daniele Ferreira dos Santos fell ill with a high fever and angry red splotches on her skin.

headline.main: Life at Zika Epicenter a Struggle for Afflicted Family
headline.print_headline: Life at Zika Epicenter a Struggle for Afflicted Family

docs.snippet: Around the fifth month of her pregnancy, Daniele Ferreira dos Santos fell ill with a high fever and angry red splotches on her skin.

docs.lead_paragraph: As alarm grows over Zika, airlines are allowing passengers to change flights or receive refunds, and some tour companies are seeing cancellations.

headline.main: How the Zika Virus Is Affecting Travel
headline.print_headline: As Zika Concerns Grow, the Travel Industry Reacts

docs.abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention warnings against travel to areas affected by Zika virus, particularly for pregnant women or those planning a pregnancy, are bringing reactions across travel industry; number of airlines have issued statements concerning their rebooking and refund policies for travelers with reservations to impacted areas, and cruise lines are also working with customers who want to postpone or cancel travel.
docs.snippet: As alarm grows over Zika, airlines are allowing passengers to change flights or receive refunds, and some tour companies are seeing cancellations.
